CustomField.description: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Résine"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Stellite"))," EXTRAIRE ","") + IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Résine"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Stellite"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Inlay onlay facette"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Inlay core"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Projet esthétique")),Ligne__r.Liste_des_dents__c ,"")
CustomField.formula: IF( Ligne__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Resine"," EXTRAIRE ","") + IF( OR(Ligne__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Resine",ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Inlay onlay facette"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Inlay core"),ISPICKVAL( Business_case__r.Sous_cran__c ,"Projet esthétique")),Ligne__r.Liste_des_dents__c ,"")
CustomField.label: Comp1
